entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • StreamPipeReader NullReferenceException in some multithreading scenarios #101893
  • GC root enumerating crashing with BULK_WRITEBARRIER helper on the stack #101890
  • [API Proposal]: `ActivatorUtilities.CreateFactory<T>` with params span #101889
  • [API Proposal]: Add missing parameters to IdnMapping to comply with UTS46 #101887
  • Typed HttpClient configuration is lost when a service is registered a second time #101884
  • Exception when calling Domain.GetCurrentDomain() in Native AOT #101882
  • Increase superpmi build timeout at least for windows/arm64 #101879

Closed

  • Too many open issues should be closed #101888
  • HttpListener: Managed implementation allows authenticated clients to connect successfully when if _listener.AuthenticationSchemes = AuthenticationSchemes.None; #22195
  • JIT should fold repeated bounds checks for readonly access #98583
    Future
  • ARM64: Left over dead code for special throw blocks #37675
    9.0.0
  • Jit: Bounds checks are not removed in some inlined functions #32414
    Future
  • [JIT][PGO] Incorrect weights produced by expand-casts optimizations #50030
    9.0.0
  • [JIT] Casting System.Func lacks quick inlined check #54452
    Future
  • Custom JsonConverter CanConvert returns true but Read is never called. #101881
  • [API Proposal]: Provide public implementation to sort IList<T> instances in place #101883
  • NET 7 new GC high lock contention #82715
    Future
  • Test failure _Avx512F_VL_Vector256_ro::JIT.HardwareIntrinsics.X86._Avx512F_VL_Vector256.Program.RoundScaleSingle0() #94739
    9.0.0
  • Enable AddressSanitizer on Windows #89134
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Use QueueUserAPC2 for EE suspension on CoreCLR win-arm64. #101891
    arch-arm64, os-windows, area-VM-coreclr
  • Enable AVX512 embedded masking for most other intrinsics #101886
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Arm64/Sve: Some optimizations around loop scenario #101885
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Prototype fix for `Environement.GetCommandLineArgs()[0]` (#101837) #101880
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Bump chrome for testing - linux: 124.0.6367.118, windows: 124.0.6367.119 #101878
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono

Merged

  • Fix check for AppleClang in src/native/libs and fix warnings #101875
    needs-area-label
  • Add tests for OAVariantLib #101841
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Arm64/Sve: Implement SVE Math Min*/Max* APIs #101859
    arm-sve

Updated

  • Update auto-generated native AOT metadata wrappers to use readonly structs #101895
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Remove O1K_VALUE_NUMBER #101894
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Allow async interruptions on safepoints #95565
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Convert OAVariant interop to managed #100176
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0-staging] Add support for enumerating keyed services with KeyedService.AnyKey #95853
    NO-MERGE, area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, 8.0.x
  • Specify that `0x` is case-invariant in the Convert class #101876
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Refactor some DateTime and TimeSpan formatting/parsing methods #101640
    area-System.Globalization, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [TEST] noop change to see if tests are passing #85694
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW
  • Optimize BigInteger.Parse #97589
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Simplify BigInteger.Multiply #98587
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Optimize BigInteger.Divide #96895
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Optimize 'ConvertOrWidenPrimitivesEnumsAndPointersIfPossible' #101858
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono] Enable NativeToManaged wrappers to get compiled with LLVM #96910
    NO-MERGE, area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Add FreeBSD-specific logic to pal::get_default_installation_dir_for_arch #100731
    os-freebsd, area-Host, community-contribution
  • Set version in ZIP local header to ZIP64, when the file offset is >4GB #94970
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • Make it possible to eliminate branches guarded by IsEnum #100399
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Make SocketsHttpHandler the default primary handler from HttpClientFactory #101808
    area-Extensions-HttpClientFactory
  • Simplify/optimize Int128 comparison operators #101848
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Merge JIT/Methodical tests into the merged runners #101317
    area-Infrastructure
  • Porting `SuspendAllThreads` from the NativeAOT to CoreCLR. #101782
    area-VM-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-05
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Build on Linux #2574

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Include JS interop generator in ILC package #2573

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `dotnet workload` always installs maui workload as root. This is making it impossible to build a project as a regular user on Manjaro/Arch Linux #40692
  • When targeting .NET Framework, the SDK references System.IO.Compression.FileSystem, but not System.IO.Compression #40691

Closed

  • AppCommand Assignment for self-contained apps duplicate entrypoint (both self-contained and non-self-contained variants) #40690

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-05
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Extensions #5497
    Working Set

PullRequests

Updated

  • Add proposal for overload resolution priority #7906

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Debug Assertion error ConversionsBase.ClassifyImplicitExtensionMethodThisArgConversion #73342

PullRequests

Created

  • Additional diags #73344
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Switch to static local functions #73343
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Add additional diagnostic info #73341
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Add helper for common pattern of producing an array. #73336
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Remove nonreentrantlock type #72087
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Improve C# grammar generator. #73340
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix Double-to-Long overflow check #73016
    Area-Compilers, Community, 17.11
  • Improve parser recovery around nullable types in patterns #72805
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudAddProduct, ApiCrudUpdateProduct #55540
  • Perf improvement: fortunes #55539
  • BlazorBFFOidc and DevTunnel - Auth to MS Entra works for swagger SPA and nearly working for Blazor website #55537
  • Introduce generic `JsonResult<T>` #55535
  • Issue with OutputCache in Blazor SSR #55534
  • Perf regression: mvc #55533

Closed

  • Perf regression: fortunes_ef #55493
  • Perf improvement: plainTextEmptyFilter #55532
  • Published size regression: basicminimalapipublishaot #55306

PullRequests

Updated

  • update project templates package reference #55155
    area-mvc, stale, community-contribution, pr: pending author input, pending-ci-rerun
  • Add analyzer for custom IProblemDetailsWriter registration #49286
    area-mvc, analyzer, community-contribution, area-web-frameworks, pending-ci-rerun

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Icon Button in ToolBar does not change the Size In Windows Plarform #22210

Closed

  • Maui Popup ArgumentNullException Value cannot be null. (Parameter 'handler.Container') PopupHandler.MapSize(PopupHandler handler, IPopup view) #22212

PullRequests

Created

  • [iOS] Span's TapGestureRecognizer not working if text is truncated #22213
    community ✨

Updated

  • [Android] Geolocation IsListeningForeground property is always false #21919
    platform/android 🤖, area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #21092
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, do-not-merge, area/infrastructure 🏗️
